Texts.Chs: 酸液：我想你不想在里面泡澡吧？因为它会腐蚀你！与其他debuff差不多，你可以在设备中制造出防护酸液的装备。还有，硫酸也是一种酸。
Texts.Eng: Acid: You don't want to take a dip in sulphuric acid. It's not good for your long-term survival goals. Instead, protect yourself with a layer of Acid Protection. Many suits of armor provide this, as well as augments you can craft in your nanofabricator.

Texts.Chs: 生物软泥：这种液体会黏住你，让你生病。你得想想，如果你在被黏住的时候，突然冒出一大堆怪物是多么可怕的事情！常见于原体世界和其余的地形。
Texts.Eng: Bio Ooze: This fluid will stick to you, make you ill and affect your movement and survival chances while active. Wearing protection is recommended. Most common on Proto Worlds and a few other select biomes.

Texts.Chs: 焦油：它会让你慢下来，并且跳跃能力将会大幅降低。它只会妨碍你的移动，而不会对你造成任何实质伤害。当然，你也可以使用各类防护装备消除它对你的影响。
Texts.Eng: Black Tar: Black tar slows you down ^red;a lot^reset; and makes jumping a decent height nearly impossible. It hampers, but does not directly cause damage. You can block it with various armors or produce.

Texts.Chs: FrackinUniverse增加了大量的DEBUFF。以下这个简短的指南或许能够帮助到你。点击下一页继续。
Texts.Eng: FrackinUniverse adds a great number of additional status effects. This short guide should help to sort them out for you. Click next page to continue.

Texts.Chs: 恐惧：恐惧会使你的能力不断下降，另外还会给予你持续性的伤害。通常这种效果存在于阿托罗斯地形。
Texts.Eng: Insanity: A constant degradation of your mental state, insanity saps your ability to protect yourself over a sustained period by draining your Protection. Additionally, it gives a mild bit of damage per tick. Augments and armor exist to combat this nasty effect. You'll find this effect on Atropus biomes.

Texts.Chs: 请注意，还有许多奇奇怪怪的效果，会使你的探索艰苦万分。总之，请在冒险前做好万分的准备，前戏总是最重要的，如果你不想猫车的话。
Texts.Eng: Note that there are many other effects you can be affected by in your exploration of the universe. Not all of them can be resisted, and some might be resisted by surprising things. Just stay aware...and stay safe.

Texts.Chs: 有机汤：你遇上它真是棒极了！它不仅会提高你的生命值上限，还可以吃！如果你愿意，你甚至可以在里面洗澡！
Texts.Eng: Organic Soup: One of the few effects that is actually something you *want*. Organic soup will increase your health total as well as remove the effects of hunger (and even fill you up!). Take a bath in it when you can!

Texts.Chs: 毒液：现在举例两种毒：汞、黑水，剩余的就要靠你慢慢发现了。还有免疫毒液的装备将会阻挡住所有的毒液，而不是特指其中某种毒。
Texts.Eng: Poison: Fairly self explanatory. You don't want to be poisoned, but some are worse than others. You've got basic poison, mercury poison (which is especially nasty), and darkwater poison to name a few. Poison protection will block all poison types, not just one.

Texts.Chs: 压强：这也许是最快致死的效果，如果你没有应对的措施，它可以在^red;几秒钟内杀了你^reset;。幸运的是，它一般只存在于气体地形。我建议你在没有抗压的装备，不要作死。
Texts.Eng: Pressure: Perhaps the deadliest of all the status effects, extreme pressure will ^red;definitely kill you in seconds^reset; if you do not have protection. Thankfully, it is found in few places (primarily on Gas Ball biomes). Do not risk this environment effect without a protective suit. You *will* die.

Texts.Chs: 原液：这种讨厌的效果是原体世界给你的礼物之一。它会逐渐降低你的生命值上限，直至你死亡。请从各种设备中制造出原液防护特性的装备，它能更有效地帮助你抵抗原液。
Texts.Eng: Proto Poison: This nasty effect is a threat on Proto Worlds. It will slowly sap your maximum health and *will* eventually kill you. Seek out proto-poison protection from various gear in your lab stations. Augments are always an option.

Texts.Chs: 脓液：想必你看到这个词就会觉得反胃！的确，它会导致你胃痛和恶心。不过你应该庆幸的是，它不会让你直接致命。
Texts.Eng: Pus: This fluid is absolutely repulsive, and even having the stuff on you causes retching and nausea. To traverse it, you will need some sort of protection. Thankfully, it is rarely lethal.

Texts.Chs: 脓液：想必你看到这个词就会觉得反胃！的确，它会导致你胃痛和恶心。不过你应该庆幸的是，它不会让你直接致命。
温度：寒冷、炎热、辐射是StarBound本身自带的变量。而Frackin' Universe则为它们提高了一个层次：^orange;致命寒冷、致命高温、致命辐射^reset;。如果你想在这类温度上存活，请穿戴上特定免疫属性的装备。
Texts.Eng: Temperature: Cold, Heat and Radiation are things from ordinary Starbound. Frackin' Universe adds its own tiers of these in the form of ^orange;Deadly Cold, Deadly Heat and Deadly Radiation^reset;. To survive these hazards you'll need special gear (this gear usually displays the immunity) such as Mutavisk Armor for Deadly Radiation.

Texts.Chs: 地面效果：当你踏上某些方块时，它会产生buff或debuff，这类方块通常并不会高亮显示。雪、烂泥、丛林的土块和黏土则是减缓你的移动速度。而沥青则会提高你在地面的移动速度。如果你要深入了解，请多加实践。
Texts.Eng: Tile Effects:  Some tiles give buffs or debuffs when stepped on. Many of these will not give indicators, but will affect your movement. Snow, mud, jungle dirt and clay are some examples of this in action. Asphalt increases your ground speed, which is useful in bases. Experiment, and you might find some really useful stuff.
